RelatedSentence: Police are seeking any assistance from the public in locating the driver .
The collision occurred at West Broadway and Woody when a 52 - year - old pedestrian was hit by an vehicle driving east .
The pedestrian was walking his bike across Broadway .
The impact knocked the man and his bicycle to the street , while the suspect vehicle continued on Broadway .
An unknown passing motorist stopped and assisted the victim .
Police say the victim suffered a broken wrist and was treated at the hostpital before reporting the incident .
Police say the victim suffered a broken wrist and was treated at the hostpital before reporting the incident .
Tire skid marks were found at the scene by police .
If you have any information on the accident please call MPD Accident Investigator Stanley Fullerton at ( 406 ) 552-6300 , or Missoula Crimestoppers at ( 406 ) 721-4444 .
